text: André Holland (born December 28, 1979) is an American actor. He got a lot of attention for his performance as Kevin in the 2016 Academy Award-winning movie Moonlight. Holland has acted in theatre plays, television programs and movies. His first on-screen performance was in an episode of the drama series Law & Order in 2006. Also in 2006, he played three characters on stage in the play Blue Door. The New York Times gave the performance a good review. Holland was born in Bessemer, Alabama. ==References== Category:People from Bessemer, Alabama Category:African-American actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Alabama Category:1979 births Category:Living people
title: André Holland
